option.name: originalContent
option.value:
version: '3.8'
services: postgres: image: postgres:16 container_name: ms-usuario-db environment: POSTGRES_DB: ${DB_NOME} POSTGRES_USER: ${DB_USUARIO} POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${DB_PASSWORD} ports: - "5434:5432" volumes: - gadata:/var/lib/postgresql/data
volumes: gadata:

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
version: '3.8'
services: postgres: image: postgres:16 container_name: ms-usuario-db environment: POSTGRES_DB: ${DB_NOME} POSTGRES_USER: ${DB_USUARIO} POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${DB_PASSWORD} ports: - "5434:5432" volumes: - gadata:/var/lib/postgresql/data
volumes: gadata:

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
spring: application: name: usuario
datasource: url: ${DB_POSTGRES} username: ${DB_USUARIO} password: ${DB_PASSWORD} driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
jpa: show-sql: true
flyway: enabled: true locations: classpath:db/migration baseline-on-migrate: true validate-on-migrate: true schemas: public
server: port: 8080

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
spring: application: name: usuario
datasource: url: ${DB_POSTGRES} username: ${DB_USUARIO} password: ${DB_PASSWORD} driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
jpa: show-sql: true
flyway: enabled: true locations: classpath:db/migration baseline-on-migrate: true validate-on-migrate: true schemas: public
server: port: 8080
